gobblin.hive.policy

Class HiveSnapshotRegistrationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.policy.HiveRegistrationPolicyBase
      • gobblin.hive.policy.HiveSnapshotRegistrationPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiveRegistrationPolicy

    @Alpha
public class HiveSnapshotRegistrationPolicy
extends HiveRegistrationPolicyBase
    A HiveRegistrationPolicy for registering snapshots.

      • getLatestSnapshot

        protected Path getLatestSnapshot(Path path)
                          throws IOException
        Get the latest snapshot in the given Path.

        The lastest snapshot is a sub-directory of the input Path that has the largest folder name alphabetically. If property SNAPSHOT_PATH_PATTERN is set, only those sub-directories whose full path matches the given pattern are considered.

        Throws:
        IOException
